meanings.sent1: I mislocated my keys and couldn't find them in the morning.
meanings.sent2: She mislocated the book on the wrong shelf.
meanings.sent3: The mislocated umbrella ended up in the shoe rack.
meanings.sent4: His mislocated sense of direction led us astray.
meanings.sent5: The mislocated painting hung crooked on the wall.

meanings.sent1: The mislocated chair was blocking the doorway.
meanings.sent2: The mislocated sign confused the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her mislocated necklace clashed with her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The mislocated plant struggled to get sunlight.
